name: Sprout
description:
After your character uses a Skill to trigger Dendro-Related Reactions: Deal 1 Dendro DMG. (Once per Round)
Duration (Rounds): 1
descriptionraw: After your character uses a Skill to trigger $[K217]: Deal 1 $[K107]. (Once per Round)\n$[K4]: 1
